choiceresponse.label: Which two of the following statements could represent the proposition: All your data is in the cloud

checkboxgroup.choice: All data is somewhere above the Empire State Building
All your data is stored in large collections of servers accessible over the internet
How your data is stored is ambiguous and unclear
All the data you manage is stored in data storage services on systems like Microsoft's Azure or Amazon's AWS
All data you manage is stored on your computer
